io.spine.server.storage.memory

Class InMemoryRecordStorage<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.storage.AbstractStorage<I,io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord,RecordReadRequest<I>>
      • io.spine.server.storage.RecordStorage<I>
        • io.spine.server.storage.memory.InMemoryRecordStorage<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of entity IDs
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage<I,io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord,RecordReadRequest<I>>, StorageWithLifecycleFlags<I,io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord,RecordReadRequest<I>>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class InMemoryRecordStorage<I>
extends RecordStorage<I>
    Memory-based implementation of RecordStorage.

      • readMultipleRecords

        protected java.util.Iterator<io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord> readMultipleRecords(java.lang.Iterable<I> givenIds,
                                                                                      com.google.protobuf.FieldMask fieldMask)
        Description copied from class: RecordStorage
        Obtains an iterator for reading multiple records by IDs, and applying the passed field mask to the results.

        The size of the returned Iterator matches the size of the given ids, with nulls in place of missing or inactive entities.

        Specified by:
        readMultipleRecords in class RecordStorage<I>
        See Also:
        BulkStorageOperationsMixin.readMultiple(java.lang.Iterable)

      • readAllRecords

        protected java.util.Iterator<io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord> readAllRecords()
        Description copied from class: RecordStorage
        Obtains an iterator for reading all records.

        Only active entities are returned if the entity class inherits EntityWithLifecycle.

        Specified by:

      • readAllRecords

        protected java.util.Iterator<io.spine.server.entity.EntityRecord> readAllRecords(EntityQuery<I> query,
                                                                                 com.google.protobuf.FieldMask fieldMask)
        Description copied from class: RecordStorage
        Obtains an iterator for reading records matching the query, and applying the passed field mask to the results.

        Returns only active entities if the query does not specify the lifecycle flags when the entity supports them (i.e. inherits EntityWithLifecycle). In order to read inactive entities, the corresponding filters must be set to the provided query.

        Specified by:
        readAllRecords in class RecordStorage<I>
        See Also:
        RecordStorage.readAll(EntityQuery, FieldMask)

        Specified by:
        readRecord in class RecordStorage<I>
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the record to load
        Returns:
        a record instance or null if there is no record with this ID

      • writeRecord

        protected void writeRecord(I id,
                           EntityRecordWithColumns record)
        Description copied from class: RecordStorage
        Writes a record and the associated EntityColumn values into the storage.

        Rewrites it if a record with this ID already exists in the storage.

        Specified by:
        writeRecord in class RecordStorage<I>
        Parameters:
        id - an ID of the record
        record - a record to store

      • writeRecords

        protected void writeRecords(java.util.Map<I,EntityRecordWithColumns> records)
        Description copied from class: RecordStorage
        Writes a bulk of records into the storage.

        Rewrites it if a record with this ID already exists in the storage.

        Specified by:
        writeRecords in class RecordStorage<I>
        Parameters:
        records - an ID to record map with the entries to store
